Paradigm

Related people:
  • Fred Ehrsam (Managing Partner)
  • Matt Huang (Managing Partner)
Paradigm is a cryptocurrency investment firm that has poured billions of dollars in venture capital into the cryptocurrency industry. It was co-founded by Fred Ehrsam, a co-founder of Coinbase.
